src_original: kiṃ bhadānta anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ratnacitrāntakośo hiranyeśvaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ?
tgt_original: 「彼善生長者曾作何業？ 由彼業力為客作人，復作何業於其宅中珍寶自出？

src_original: anāthapiṇḍadenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtyāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;  anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati;
tgt_original: 「今此善生先所作業，緣合成熟果報不失。

src_original: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtany upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau ḥvipacyanteḥ nābdhātau  na tejodhātau na vāyudhātāv api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
tgt_original: 凡諸有情先身所作善惡之業，非於外界地水火風而令成熟，然於自身蘊界處中業果成熟。 」即說頌曰：

src_original: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
tgt_original: 「假令經百劫，　　所作業不亡；

src_original: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // (Śay-v 32)
